problem.markdown:
Which statement(s) below are correct about program rules?
>>Select all that apply. (2 attempts)<<
[x] A. Complex data entry with little or no workflow support [x] B. Calculating coverage based upon only tracker data [x] C. Calculating completeness from individual patient data
[explanation] All options are correct. [explanation]

choiceresponse.p: Which statement(s) below are correct about program rules?
choiceresponse.label: Select all that apply. (2 attempts)

checkboxgroup.choice: A. Complex data entry with little or no workflow support
B. Calculating coverage based upon only tracker data
C. Calculating completeness from individual patient data
